      • parallelListFile

        @Deprecated
public static List<File> parallelListFile(String dir,
                                                       String... ext)
        Deprecated. 
        List all file in directory include subdir. This method is suitable for very large directory Consider using findFile with "*" pattern instead
        Parameters:
        dir - String, dir name
        ext - String array of extensions (e.g: .mp3, .wav, .au, etc.)
        Returns:
        List<File>
